*R/bindings.R*

## bind_parliament_data

## Description
 Bind parliament chart data 


## Usage
```r
 
bind_parliament_data(., data = NULL, party = NULL, seats = NULL) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| data | A data frame |
| party | Political party name |
| seats | Election results. User can include multiple Elections by including multiple columns. |
